title: detect and respond
extract: Managed detection and response is a service that arose from the need for organizations, who lack the resources, to be more cognizant of risks and improve their ability to detect and respond to threats. Different companies offer their own set of tools and procedures in detecting and responding to threats.Sep 13, 2018
extract_html: Managed detection and response is a service that arose from the need for organizations, who lack the resources, to be more cognizant of risks and improve their ability to detect and respond to threats.
